snippet.title: Love Chronicles: The Sword and the Rose
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1gPgUNM
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1npI5Nb

Try this immersive, high-quality game for FREE! Then continue the adventure with a ONE TIME unlock!
NO VIRTUAL ITEMS, NO INTERRUPTIONS... you'll OWN this game for life.

Your ship crashes on a mysterious island kingdom that's cursed with eternal winter. Find the truth, break the spell and save the kingdom in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure.

• FREE A TINY ISLAND KINGDOM FROM ENDLESS FROST
A witch, intent on revenge, has cast a spell over the island. Explore the island and collect the scattered petals of a magical rose in order to summon spring.

• DEFEAT A HORRIBLE BEAST!
A terrifying beast resides on the island. Use the skills you'll gain on your journey to destroy the monster.

• SAVE A PRINCESS!
Defeat the sinister witch and halt her curse. Save the princess, restore her kingdom and free her people.

• UNLOCK THIS LOVELY COLLECTOR'S EDITION TO BREAK THE SPELL
Play the exciting bonus game and download the charming wallpapers. Take a peek behind the scenes at the beautiful concept art.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
